title: PlotExt
description: Developed a software using Python which can take as input a PDF and detect all the plots/graphs in it and converts them into into Tabular data. It involves various modules like Graph Detection, Scale Detection, Legend Detection and converting the data from image to table.

title: English to SQL Query
description: Developed a web application which can convert natural language to SQL query. I used OpenAI API to convert english text to sql query, React for frontend and Express for backend.
